Changeset.Change: Added support for generic resource deletion and node unregistration to information system provider
State Handling supports xml processing and endpoint management
Added support for local node resolution
Added GetMatchingNodes method to IS provider, which returns all candidates
Added CreateGenericResource method to IS provider
New Query object and corresponding method in IS provider
Added support for execution status reporting
Added support for open ended host information publishing
Added support in InformationSystem interface for OpenSearch queries
Added support in InformationSystem interface for Condor related queries
